column5: Hey crazyhook, If you got your eye on the magic muskie bait let me know. All help confidential
I had a magic lure  but it disappeared.............
myfavorite musky bait of all time has been discountined ( both the way its made an the color) I have about 16 substitues but its not the same...

I have a few of those magic lures as well and all they did was magically remove more money from my wallet.  Give me a spinnerbait and or a jig and i will catch fish (why then do i have 5 tackle boxes full of stuff ?)
I've got a buddy that claims all he needs is a plastic worm and a white spinnerbait to catch fish... but he's a Cheap American Bassturd!!!    This is my "Magic Lure"... his name is Marcel!
I believe that is a Rapala Jointed Shad Rap (JSR-7)?
You were real close kennyman, it's a JSR5
GCD - I have good luck with those JSR's....5 and 7.  Caught a few nice ones with them this past fall/winter.
My magic lure this fall was a size 12 Purple Perch Husky Jerk.  Caught 4 walleyes over 10 pounds in 3 days on it. Ofcourse, I was also in the magic spot. Lumberjack
